constraints.name: character_frequency_ratio
constraints.description: 字符串中元音字符的数量不超过辅音字符数量的两倍（v ≤ 2c）
constraints.formal: v ≤ 2c, where v is the number of vowels and c is the number of consonants in the substring

constraints.name: max_substring_length
constraints.description: 找到满足上述条件的最长子串，并统计这些最长子串的数量
constraints.formal: Find the maximum length L of a good substring and count the number of such substrings

result.description: 求满足条件的最长子数组长度

invariants.name: monotonicity
invariants.description: 双指针左右端点单调前进，区间合法性可单调维护

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 区间和可通过端点差值计算，满足前缀和性质
